start_wsp.name: beatification.n.2
start_wsp.definition: (Roman Catholic Church) an act of the Pope who declares that a deceased person lived a holy life and is worthy of public veneration; a first step toward canonization

end_wsp.name: roman_catholic.n.1
end_wsp.definition: the Christian Church based in the Vatican and presided over by a pope and an episcopal hierarchy

end_wsp.definition: of or relating to or supporting Romanism
